remarks: The function ` I ` returns closed-below open-above dyadic rational intervals covering the real line.  This is the same construction as in ~ dyadmbl .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Sep-2017.)
statement:
sxbrsiga.0 $e |- J = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
dya2ioc.1 $e |- I = ( x e. ZZ , n e. ZZ |-> ( ( x / ( 2 ^ n ) ) [,) ( ( x + 1 ) / ( 2 ^ n ) ) ) ) $.
dya2iocival $p |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ X e. ZZ ) -> ( X I N ) = ( ( X / ( 2 ^ N ) ) [,) ( ( X + 1 ) / ( 2 ^ N ) ) ) ) $.
$d n x $.
